title: "Heart & Mind" custom lettering
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419081521im_/http:/typophile.com/files/heart&mind4-V2-01_6547.jpg)

Hey guys I've been working on this custom lettering project. What do you guys think? Is the composition balanced? Is this too busy? Your suggestions & constructive criticism would be much appreciated!

It's inspired by this quote... "Wealth is of the heart and mind, not the pocket" by Pharrell.

Thanks,  
- Joseph  
 [www.josephle.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419081521/http:/www.josephle.net/ "www.josephle.net")
author: joseph_le

comments.content: The one thing I wonder is why the crossbar of the t doesn't go through (or maybe I should say over and under) like the crossbar of the H. For the rest of your question, I'm not really qualified to comment.

The one thing I wonder is why the crossbar of the t doesn't go through (or maybe I should say over and under) like the crossbar of the H. For the rest of your question, I'm not really qualified to comment.
